title: Cheesy Bacon, Ham, and Swiss Tater Tots® Poutine

Ingredients.1: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen bite-size potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)

Ingredients.6: 3 slices bacon strips, cooked and crumbled

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place potato nuggets on a baking sheet in an even layer and bake until lightly browned and crisp, about 20 minutes.

Directions.3: Remove from the oven and top with gravy, diced ham, Swiss cheese, and Cheddar cheese. Return to the oven and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

Directions.4: Top with crumbled bacon and chives. Scatter cheese curds around and serve immediately.
